## Générations
```{r generations}
    vecteur = rep(0, 50)
    for (i in 1:50){
      myseed = set.seed(i)
      syn_ctree = syn(df, method = "ctree", seed = myseed)
    }
```

```{r uniques}
    replicated.uniques(syn_ctree, df)
```

## Tests
```{r tests}
    timer$start("ranger")
    syn_ranger = syn(df, method = "ranger")
    timer$stop("ranger")
    utility.gen(syn_ranger, df)

    replicated.uniques(syn_ranger, df)
```
